description:

#IGN #Gaming
title: Stellar Blade - 13 Minutes of 4K 60FPS PC Gameplay on Geforce RTX 5090

author: IGN
description:
Check out Pizza Bandit, an ultraviolent shooter by Jofsoft. In it, you play as a pizzamaker with more than just dough on his mind. PC Early Access for Pizza Bandit starts on August 25, 2025. A demo is out now on Steam, featuring 3 new bounty missions.

Set in a future where time travel is real, Pizza Bandit follows Malik, an ex-mercenary finally chasing his childhood dream: opening a pizza restaurant. Though he was built for battle, not baking, he’s determined to make it work. With nothing but an empty venue and no money, Malik takes on high-risk bounty missions through time to fund his dream.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Pizza Bandit - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out The Explorator, a first-person shooter by Remnant Games. Search for priceless treasures buried in Atlantis and more while avoiding creatures who wish you harm in this hand-crafted 2D animated shooter. The Explorator's early access is available now on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Explorator - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
How to Train Your Dragon, reviewed by Eric Goldman.

The live-action remake of How to Train Your Dragon is incredibly faithful to the animated version in nearly every way, to the point that it could feel redundant to anyone who’s seen the original. But at the same time, writer/director Dean DeBlois’ re-creation of a story he first told 15 years ago shows he still has a lot of affection for this world and these characters, and that gives this How to Train Your Dragon an impressive amount of resonance. Within all its rigid recitation, there’s a heart and soul that demonstrates how DeBlois has managed to get so much mileage out of the loving story of a Viking boy and the dragon he befriends.
title: How to Train Your Dragon Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer 2 for Echo Valley, a drama thriller distributed by Apple TV+. 

In the edge-of-your-seat thriller "Echo Valley,” Kate (Oscar winner Julianne Moore) is a mother struggling to make peace with her troubled daughter Claire (multi-Emmy nominee Sydney Sweeney) — a situation that becomes even more perilous when Claire shows up on Kate’s doorstep, hysterical and covered in someone else’s blood. As Kate pieces together the shocking truth of what happened, she learns just how far a mother will go to try to save her child in this gripping tale of love, sacrifice and survival from BAFTA-winning director Michael Pearce and Emmy-nominated writer Brad Ingelsby.

Echo Valley begins streaming on June 13 exclusively on Apple TV+.
title: Echo Valley - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Sydney Sweeney, Julianne Moore, Kyle MacLachlan

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer for Yooka-Replaylee, a 3D platformer developed by Playtonic Games. Players will take on a collectathon adventure filled with challenges, secrets, mechanics, and more. The new demo includes brand new features and content not seen in the original Yooka-Laylee. The demo for Yooka-Replaylee is available now for PC (Steam) as part of Steam Next Fest with the game launching on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam) in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Yooka-Replaylee - Official Steam Next Fest Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Now Streaming on Disney Plus' Trailer for Disney's Snow White, a live-action reimagining of the animated classic distributed by Walt Disney Pictures. Fans can take the magic home with Disney's Snow White streaming now on Disney+.

Watch Disney’s Snow, a live-action musical reimagining of the studio’s classic 1937 film. Disney's Snow White stars Rachel Zegler in the title role and Gal Gadot as her Stepmother, the Evil Queen. Disney's Snow White opens in theaters now.

Disney’s Snow White is directed by Marc Webb, written by Erin Cressida Wilson, and produced by Marc Platt, p.g.a., and Jared LeBoff, p.g.a., with Callum McDougall serving as executive producer, and features all-new original songs from Benj Pasek and Justin Paul.

#IGN #Disney #Movies
title: Disney's Snow White - Official 'Now Streaming on Disney Plus' Trailer (2025) Rachel Zegler

author: IGN
description:
Dreadzone gets a new trailer and a release date announcement. Check out the latest Dreadzone trailer for this upcoming survival game set in a deadly quarantine zone. The new Dreadzone trailer shows resource gathering, hunting, gameplay, and combat against deadly enemies. Dreadzone will be available on PC via Steam Early Access on July 17, 2025.

In Dreadzone, scavenge for resources, craft tools, build shelter, and survive against dangerous animals, zombies, mutants, and other survivors. Explore the zone where desperation drives everyone to do whatever it takes to survive.
title: Dreadzone - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the third episode of Last Sentinel's Developer Diary series! This is an inside look at LightSpeed LA during the development of LAST SENTINEL, their narrative-focused open-world action game set in reconstructed Tokyo.
In this episode, LightSpeed LA chats about how the team's originality led them to create a wholly unique world. 
Presented by LAST SENTINEL
title: Last Sentinel - Dev Diary Episode 3 "Originality"

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Tickets on Sale' Trailer for Superman, the start of the new DCU helmed by James Gunn distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. See one of Summer 2025's biggest films with Superman, releasing in theaters and IMAX on July 11, with tickets on sale now.

Superman stars David Corenswet in the dual role as Superman/Clark Kent, Rachel Brosnahan as Lois Lane, and Nicholas Hoult as Lex Luthor. The film also stars Skyler Gisondo as Jimmy Olsen, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, Isabela Merced, Sara Sampaio, Maria Gabriela de Faria, Wendell Pierce, Alan Tudyk, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Neva Howell, Beck Bennett as Steve Lombard, Mikaela Hoover as Cat Grant, and Christopher McDonald as Ron Troupe. 

Superman is executive produced by Nikolas Korda, Chantal Nong Vo and Lars Winther. Behind the camera, Gunn is joined by frequent collaborators, including director of photography Henry Braham, production designer Beth Mickle, costume designer Judianna Makovsky and composer John Murp
title: Superman - Official 'Tickets on Sale' Trailer (2025) David Corenswet, Nicholas Hoult

author: IGN
description:
Fear not. The performace issues that's plagued The Legend of Zelda Link's Awakening on The Nintendo Switch since its released has become a thing of the past. Thanks to the recently released Nintendo Switch 2, Link's Awakening runs buttery smooth on the new console at a 4K resoltuion with a frame rate of 60fps. Watch as we wander around the early game to showcase how the game runs on the Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening Gameplay on Switch 2 in 4K, 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Unlocking all 40 karts in Mario Kart World requires collecting 3,000 coins, which can be a slow grind if you're only racing. In this video, we break down faster and more efficient ways to farm coins in Free Roam mode. Learn how to follow the red wind-up car across the map for a massive coin haul, and discover how to trail other vehicles like jet skis and cars with coin trails to steadily boost your count. Prefer a more hands-off approach? We show you how to use Toad’s Factory for semi-automatic coin collection while you take a break. Whether you're actively farming or looking for a more passive method, these tips will help you unlock every kart in no time.

Check out our expanding wiki on IGN.com for tips on unlocking characters, vehicles, new courses, modes and more!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/mario-kart-world

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:15 - Red Car Coin Farm
01:09 - Common Car/Jetski Farm
01:28 - Toad’s Factory Conveyor Belt Farm

#MarioKartWorld #Gaming #IGN
title: Mario Kart World: Unlock All Karts Quickly | Best Coin Farming Tricks

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Release Date Announcement Trailer for SCUM, an open-world survival crafting game developed by Gamepires. Players will traverse a world full of hazardous environments to loot, craft, and fight for their lives. Customize a maximum-security prisoner under the watchful eye of the TEC1 corporation to freefall onto SCUM island and compete with 64 other players in a televised deathmatch. SCUM is launching into full version 1.0 on June 17 for PC (Steam).

#SCUM #Gaming #IGN
title: SCUM - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

Super Meat Boy 3D will be released on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S (including day one on Game Pass) in early 2026. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3288210/Super_Meat_Boy_3D/

description: Capcom finally revealed Resident Evil: Requiem, the ninth mainline game in the long-running survival horror franchise. We got a rare hands-on preview at Summer Game Fest where we encountered Resident Evil Requiem's new monster, played in both first-person and third-person perspective, and learned more about the new protagonist Grace Ashcroft.
title: We Played Resident Evil Requiem

author: IGN
description: ABRAHAM’S BOYS follows Max and Rudy Van Helsing, who have spent their lives under the strict and overprotective rule of their father, Abraham. Unaware of his dark past, they struggle to understand his paranoia and increasingly erratic behavior. But when they begin to uncover the violent truths behind their father’s history with Dracula, their world unravels, forcing them to confront the terrifying legacy they were never meant to inherit.
title: Abraham's Boys: A Dracula Story - Official Trailer (2025) Titus Welliver, Jocelin Donahue

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Minecraft trailer to see the Add-On inspired by Universal Picture’s live-action reimagining of DreamWorks Animation’s How to Train Your Dragon. With the How to Train Your Dragon Add-On for Minecraft, discover and bond with iconic dragons in any of your own worlds. Learn each Dragon's personality and customize your fits with matching armor from the Forge. Earn their trust to become a dragon rider and unlock their unique abilities. You can also ride solo or with friends. You can also claim your free Hiccup's Viking Helmet in the Dressing Room.

#IGN #Gaming #Minecraft
title: Minecraft - Official How to Train Your Dragon Add-On Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join developer Capstan Games for a deeper dive into the world of Ahoy, an upcoming multiplayer naval game set in the 1780s. The latest Ahoy trailer shows what you can expect from the game, including development roadmap details, the team's goals, and much more. Ahoy will be available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store). A Kickstarter campaign for Ahoy is also available now.

Ahoy is a multiplayer voyage to the 1780s. Cooperate with fellow captains and officers to explore the West Indies. Trade goods, manage your Player and NPC crew, and engage in ferocious naval battles. Master seamanship to forge a legacy in this historically accurate representation of the Age of Sail.
title: Ahoy - Official Kickstarter: Welcome Aboard! Trailer

title: LEGO Party Looks Set to Keep LEGO's Video Game Winning Streak Going
